Class OrderItem

java.lang.Object
  OrderItem

public class OrderItem
extends Object

This class models an item in an order. It contains the following information:

  1. the product being purchased, a Product reference
  2. the quantity of the product in the order, an int

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
Product
